QuestData.Title: Moonwhisper Rescue
QuestData.Description:
As a druid I understand that predation happens. Creatures that eat meat must acquire meat.
But this...
<Solendra gestures angrily toward a nearby petrified nightsaber.>
This is just sad. Free them, $r. Take my blessing and free them from this needless torment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 5 Petrified Nightsabers using Solendra's Gift.
